```{r}
library(curl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

load the data
```{r}
gap <- read.csv(curl("http://bit.ly/gap_data"))
```

```{r}
eu_52 <- gap %>%
  filter(continent == "Europe", year == 1952)
ggplot(data = eu_52, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() 
```
